111.content:
https://www.playmobil.de/bauarbeiter/311...
This will be our hero and main character of the little story I want to establish here.
His name is Marc and he is 16 years old and starting a traineeship at a well know local construction company. He has finished basic school, not because he might not be intelligent or not having the brains, but he is just a lacy guy and his parents don’t care to much for him.
Anyhow he is happy to have his first day at the construction, where the build a new school house.
He meets his boss, foreman John Meyers:
https://www.playmobil.de/bauarbeiter/311...
Since both of them have brooms they have to clean the road where some truck has lost some dirt…
https://www.playmobil.de/bau---truck/320...
Suddenly something unexpected happened?
111.title: on a construction

1112.content:
https://www.playmobil.de/hochbauarbeiter...
A new guy comes around and brings beer, which is strictly forbidden and prohibited.
It is Alfred, on older guy and he tries to influence the younger ones, especially Marc. He offers Marc a bottle of beer. Can Marc resist?
1112.title: offer of some beer

11121.content:
https://www.playmobil.de/baustellwagen-m...
Alfred meets Marc in the trailer, where they are not seen by the foreman or anybody else. Again there he repeats his offer.
Marc is strong enough to resist and runs outside to inform the foreman.
The foreman informs the owner of the construction company and the boss comes around
https://www.playmobil.de/mann-mit-zylind...
Boss fires Alfred and calls the police, who arrives with some truck to bring Alfred to the police station
https://www.playmobil.de/polizei---auto/...

1132122.content:
Police has to investigate about some explosion at school. A young ambitioned teacher tried to entertain her students on the last day before summer vacation has started. She performed some chemistry experiment, which backfire and burned her head and upper body. Currently she is in hospital and should not be disturbed. But officer James Jamerson has the task to go onside to school and see for evidence and maybe later ask some students about the incident.
Currently at school they start a huge construction for renewing some parts of the old building, which has a long-time back tradition here. They even say that some famous persons were attending the school in the founder years, but this is something for history, not for current investigations James has on his tasks.
He will have to meet the principal to get inside the school, because officially it is closed for summer vacation.

https://www.playmobil.de/musikunterricht...
This is the principle, she gives some music classes during the vacation

https://www.playmobil.de/polizeichef/650...
This is police officers James

https://www.playmobil.de/online-shop/liz...

113212211.content: James did not realize while flirting that his colleague from the fire workers and also the principal herself were annoyed…
113212211.title: more with James

1132122111.content: But he was good at his job and needed to find out what really happened here and why this experienced teacher suddenly mixed up some chemical liquids which caused this terrible accident….
1132122111.title: James on his job

11321221111.content: James found that someone must have mixed up the liquids in the storage, so the teacher was taking the wrong bottle of ingrediants, not knowing that the lable was manipulated.

11533121121311.content:
What happened? Why Samantha is suddenly a boy?
I asked the boy, who he is but he only stared at me and wondered about this strange question:
I am your son, Samuel- he said and when at home I asked my wife and she confirmed the same and also wondered what is wrong with me. Maybe I should go back to the hospital and let my brain checked….
Not an option, I am not crazy and have to find out what is going on here, and for the moment I was pretending that everything is all right…
11533121121311.title: tg now- fathers POV

115331211213111.content:

121.content: Under this category we will find
121.title: City Action

1211.content:
We are in a nice growing town named Playmo City and this plot will cover the actions based on a construction company of a guy called Hermann Hansen, who leads this construction company as a family business in the 3rd generation. Some day he hopes that he can handover the company to his son, who is in teenage years, but currently showed not much interest neither in the company nor in school, which made Hermann and his wife sad. They also have a daughter, who is already 18, but has other interest, mostly boys and such things…
Anyhow today the task is to renew some pipes in some street of Playmo City to avoid freeing in the upcoming winter…
The road, where the construction team is working is nearby the city museum, where currently and expedition of ancient treasures from Egypt is taken place.
One of the workers, a guy called Frank saw something. A black dressed guy on a blue bike just broke into the museum. It is early morning, so the museum is not open yet.
Reference product:
https://www.playmobil.de/adventskalender...
1211.title: construction

12111.content:
Frank of course called the police, but also tried to play agent himself a little bit as he followed the guy on the bike, who obviously has stolen something from the museum.
One police officer was present already with some quad, but since the thief was using some small alleys with his bike, he could not follow.
As support another police guy on motor bike was trying to follow the thief.
The thief wanted to reach the harbor, but could police or even our guy Frank stop him?
Reference Product:
https://www.playmobil.de/motorradstreife...
12111.title: robbery at the museum

choices: more with boss of construction company
121111.content:
After a while the principal of this school came to me and informed me that investigations are done and I should have a look on the destroyed room, which I did.
It looked not good inside there, but nothing my workers can not handle. I told her that before the next school season will start it will look like new and most properly even better.
Then I called one of my workers, a specialist for such tasks.
121111.title: destroyed room

1211111.content: Hermann and the workers were waiting for the ambulance to arrive. Even so the ambulance car came in only a few minutes, it felt forever and the guy was laying on the ground lifeless. Some of the workers had taken him out from the pit….
1211111.title: waiting for the ambulance

12111111.content:

His name is Werner and according to police, who also arrived on the scene his has a wife and a son. They are expected to come to the hospital.
Within some minutes the paramedics arrived at the hospital and everything was prepared. The still not amenable guy was brought to the operation room immediately, since he needed some cardio operation to not get his heart damaged totally. The doctors do their best and hope that he can survive….

Playmo City police department leader George came to an incident at some construction side, where some poor guy got an electrical shock. Ambulance was already there and took care of the poor guy, but it doesn’t look good and promising. George had to inform the wife of the poor guy, which was always a hard task, especially as he heard that they have a 6 year old son. George was reminded about his own family…
For now he only could refer the lady to the hospital…

121111131.content:
George was about to be promoted into the board of police, who work with the mayor in the mayor office and this will be more an admirative job. So he has to find a successor for his position of leader of the department.
But for now facing the situation with the poor wife and boy, who lost their husband and father he was reflecting his own family situation: He also has a wife and a son, who is 19. His son is pretty much into American football and behind one cheerleader, the daughter of Hermann Abele, owner of the construction company….
Anyhow in this afternoon he has to make some traffic controls and while checking the speed limits there is one green sports car running pretty much to fast. George stops the car and sees a young attractive lady on the steering wheel. Asking for her papers he sees that she is Lisa Lobar, daughter of his future boss in the mayor’s office… Giving her a small warning instead of a full penalty lets him continue his life better….
Anyhow thinking about his successor he has 3 passable candidates, Linda, who is there because she is a woman and this might be a good public sign to let a woman lead the police, Jo, who might be the best man for job because of his long police and special unit experience, and there is number 3, David a black guy, who is there because of his migration background.
So the first candidate for the interview is Lisa….

15221.content:
Currently there is a construction ongoing in Playmo City. On of the oldest construction companies, which is leaded by Hermann Harris in the 5 generation, has the order the renew the old school building during the summer holiday, which is a tight time frame, only 6 weeks, but so it can be guaranteed, that school business is not disturbed.
Hermann knows how important this is, since he has a 16-year-old daughter, who is attending this school. He had lost the really good connection to her during the last couple of years, it was so easy and they were one heart and soul while she was younger, but since she entered puberty she lost the connection to her beloved Dad, at least this is how it seemed.
Of course it had to do with the company of her Dad, she was a real girl and lady and could not imagine to sit on a construction machine or something like that, but she was also Hermann’s only child and her mother could not bear a second time, because of some medical issues and complications she had at her daughters birth…Hannah, which was her name, knew that deep inside her Dad always wished to have a boy, the boy she never could be for him…..

15531.content:
Currently there is a construction ongoing in Playmo City. On of the oldest construction companies, which is leaded by Hermann Harris in the 5 generation, has the order the renew the old school building during the summer holiday, which is a tight time frame, only 6 weeks, but so it can be guaranteed, that school business is not disturbed.
Hermann knows how important this is, since he has a 16-year-old daughter, who is attending this school. He had lost the really good connection to her during the last couple of years, it was so easy and they were one heart and soul while she was younger, but since she entered puberty she lost the connection to her beloved Dad, at least this is how it seemed.
Of course it had to do with the company of her Dad, she was a real girl and lady and could not imagine to sit on a construction machine or something like that, but she was also Hermann’s only child and her mother could not bear a second time, because of some medical issues and complications she had at her daughters birth…Hannah, which was her name, knew that deep inside her Dad always wished to have a boy, the boy she never could be for him…..

They got some new trainee. Hermann always support young man, giving them a chance to get a stable life and job even they were not the best at school.
The name of the new guy is Marc and he is 16 years old, looking very masculine and deep inside he compared this guy with his daugther, which might be quite unfair, but he tried not to think about this anymore…
Also today foreman John Meyers is around and he is the teacher of Marc and some other guys in the construction company.
These days even the foreman had to do not only administration stuff, but also real work. So now John, the foreman and Marc the trainee have brooms they have to clean the road where some truck has lost some dirt…

Hannah was a typical teenage girl living in a big house in one of the best areas of Playmo City. Her parents were quite well situated and since her Dad has a welln known and good running construction company, Hannah and her family could lead a good life.
She was still at school and her marks were quite good.
Currently there were summer vacations and she was not sure what to do today on such a perfect day, where the wheather is fine and Playmo City has many options, like the beach, like mountains, where she cloud try her new mountin bike or she could just hang around in town with her friends….

15532.content:
Police has to investigate about some explosion at school. A young ambitioned teacher tried to entertain her students on the last day before summer vacation has started. She performed some chemistry experiment, which backfire and burned her head and upper body. Currently she is in hospital and should not be disturbed. But officer James Jamerson has the task to go onside to school and see for evidence and maybe later ask some students about the incident.
Currently at school they start a huge construction for renewing some parts of the old building, which has a long-time back tradition here. They even say that some famous persons were attending the school in the founder years, but this is something for history, not for current investigations James has on his tasks.
He will have to meet the principal to get inside the school, because officially it is closed for summer vacation.
